cast.name: 埃米里奥·瑞弗拉 Emilio Rivera
诺尔·古格雷米 Noel Gugliemi
克里夫顿·鲍威尔 Clifton Powell
维多利亚·索菲亚 Victoria Sophia

introduction: 在一个高中辍学率最高的城市，一条命中注定的谋杀、犯罪和贩毒之路似乎是在自由城长大的青少年的唯一生活方式。肯尼，一个年轻的篮球明星，是少数几个摆脱社会约束，无视同龄人加入帮派的压力的青少年之一。肯尼接受了在美国顶尖大学之一打大学篮球的奖学金。然而，在一系列不幸事件之后，他的大学生涯被缩短了，肯尼发现自己回到了第一广场。由于就业机会非常稀缺，肯尼发现自己走上了一条危险的道路，从此以后他可能再也不会回来了。@https://www.zhuijukan.com/dongzuo/xiaoshi2016/In a city where the high school drop out rate is at its highest, a pre-destined path of murder, crime, and drug trafficking seems to be the only way of life for teenagers growing up in Liberty City. Kenny, a young basketball star, is one of the few teens that breaks away from the social constraints by dismissing the peer pressure of joining a gang. Kenny accepts a scholarship to play college basketball at one of the states top universities. However, after a series of unfortunate events, his college career is cut short and Kenny finds himself back at square one. With employment opportunities being very scarce, Kenny finds himself straying down a dangerous path from which he may never return.
